GE07naray__u:112: <12321.27/001> [X T G1-3.6 M1.5-7 ins.:: kam arcasi mahābhāga /
GE07naray__u:201: <12322.4/2> śatrau ca mitre ca samo 'smi nityam /
GE07naray__u:208: <12322.5/201> [X M5 ins.:: tasmād anujñāṃ mama dehi deva /
GE07naray__u:209: <12322.5/202> X taṃ vai dṛṣṭvā kṛtakṛtyo bhavāmi /12322.25801/ X]
GE07naray__u:258: <12322.17/001> [X T G1-3.6 M6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: śaṃtanoḥ kathayām āsa /
GE07naray__u:495: <12323.17/001> [X T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: uparicaravasur uvāca:
GE07naray__u:524: <12323.17/101> [X T G1.3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: śṛṇu tvaṃ vacanaṃ putra /
GE07naray__u:534: <12323.19/001> [X For the ref., Bo.8 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.8 Cal. Bom..ed. subst. the line: :

GE07naray__u:637: <12323.39/101> [X K7 D4.9 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: ākāśaṃ pūrayan sarvaṃ /
GE07naray__u:720: <12323.56/001> [X K6 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn2.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.8 editions ins.: :
GE07naray__u:744: <12324.3/001> [X T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: iyaṃ vai karmabhūmir hi /
GE07naray__u:758: <12324.3/2> sa ca chāgo hy ajo jñeyo /
GE07naray__u:768: <12324.6/001> [X T G2.3.6 ins.:: yuṣmākam ajabuddhir hi /
GE07naray__u:797: <12324.12/1> ṛṣaya ūcuḥ: dhānyair yaṣṭavyam ity eṣa /
GE07naray__u:816: <12324.16/001> [X T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: viruddhaṃ vedasūtrāṇām /
GE07naray__u:846: <12324.22/001> [X T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: viruddhaṃ vedaśāstrāṇāṃ /
GE07naray__u:850: <12324.22/101> [X T G1-3.6 ins., Kumbh..ed. cont. after 819: :
GE07naray__u:868: <12324.25/101> [X K7 D4.9 ins.:: taṃ bhakto 'si mahātmānaṃ /
GE07naray__u:874: <12324.26/101> [X T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: kratuṃ samāpya piṣṭena /
GE07naray__u:878: <12324.27/001> [X T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ sarve /
GE07naray__u:918: <12324.35/101> [X G1 ins.:: gṛhītvā taṃ vasuṃ bhaktaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1214: <12326.17/2> uvāca vacanaṃ bhūyo gaccha nārada māciram //12326.17/
GE07naray__u:1245: <12326.25/101> [X K6 B9 Da3..a4 Dn4 ins.:: na vidur munayaś caiva /
GE07naray__u:1255: <12326.27/101> [X K1.7 Da3..a4 D4.5.7.9 T G1-3.6 M1.5-7 ins.:: paśya jīvasya māhātmyaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1259: <12326.27/103> [X K7 D4.9 cont.:: sarvasthaḥ sarvago viśvaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1281: <12326.29/101> [X K7 D4.9 T G2.3.6 ins.:: kālo hi paramaṃ bhūtaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1289: <12326.31/001> [X K1.2.4.7 Da3..a4 D4.5.7.9 T G1.3.6 M1.5-7 ins.:: māṃ tu jānīhi brahmarṣe /
GE07naray__u:1309: <12326.35/001> [X K1.2.4.7 Da3..a4 D4.5.7.9 T G1-3.6 M1.5-7 ins.:: pṛthagbhūtāś ca te nityaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1375: <12326.48/001> [X K6 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.7.8 ins.:: lalāṭāc caiva me rudro /
GE07naray__u:1437: <12326.62/101> [X G1 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: evaṃ rudrāya manave /
GE07naray__u:1491: <12326.71/205> X rāmo rāmaś ca rāmaś ca /
GE07naray__u:1517: <12326.74/101> [X K6 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.8 ins.:: avadhyaḥ sarvalokānāṃ /
GE07naray__u:1551: <12326.77/101> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins. after 77a:: dvāviṃśadyugaparyaye /
GE07naray__u:1577: <12326.82/001> [X Da4 Ds D7 T1 G3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.: :
GE07naray__u:1589: <12326.83/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 subst.:: kalidvāparayoḥ saṃdhāv /
GE07naray__u:1609: <12326.86/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: kṛkalāsabhūtaṃ ca nṛgaṃ /
GE07naray__u:1623: <12326.88/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: kaṃsaṃ keśiṃ tathā krūram /
GE07naray__u:1658: D7 T G1-3.6 ins. after 89:: duryodhanāparādhena /
GE07naray__u:1672: <12326.92/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: śastrair nipatitāḥ sarve /
GE07naray__u:1676: <12326.92/101> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins.:: rājyaṃ praśāsati punaḥ /
GE07naray__u:1731: <12326.102/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins.:: śrutvā brahmamukhād rudraḥ /
GE07naray__u:1775: <12326.111/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins.:: evaṃ paraṃparākhyātam /
GE07naray__u:1781: <12326.112/001> [X K7 D4.9 ins.:: nāradāc caiva devarṣeḥ /
GE07naray__u:1910: <12327.8/1> kiṃ nu brahmā ca rudraś ca /
GE07naray__u:1961: <12327.19/101> [X K6 ins.:: kiṃ tu brahmātha rudro vā /
GE07naray__u:2021: <12327.30/101> [X K7 D4.9 ins.:: etān vai sumahābhāgān /
GE07naray__u:2233: <12327.77/001> [X K6 Bo.6-9 Da3..a4 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2.3.5.8 ins.:: devā devarṣayaś cocus /
GE07naray__u:2295: <12327.89/1> sa ādiḥ sa madhyaḥ sa cāntaḥ prajānāṃ /
GE07naray__u:2296: <12327.89/2> sa dhātā sa dheyaḥ sa kartā sa kāryam /
GE07naray__u:2299: <12327.90/001> [X K1.2.4 subst.:: sa ādiḥ sa ca madhyaṃ vai /
GE07naray__u:2374: <12327.107/001> [X B6 ins.:: ity āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2470: <12328.20/001> [X Ds D8 Cs ins.:: yo 'sau rudraḥ so 'ham asmi /
GE07naray__u:2490: <12328.23/2> yas taṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti /
GE07naray__u:2491: yo 'nu taṃ sa hi mām anu //12328.23/
GE07naray__u:2623: <12328.53/4> ekayonitvāc ca parasparaṃ mahayanto lokān dhārayata iti //12328.53/
GE07naray__u:2638: <12329.3/5> naiva rātryāṃ na divase na sati nāsati na vyakte nāvyakte vyavasthite /
GE07naray__u:2639: <12329.3/6> etasyām avasthāyāṃ nārāyaṇaguṇāśrayād akṣayād ajarād anindriyād agrāhyād asaṃbhavāt satyād ahiṃsrāl lalāmād vividhapravṛttiviśeṣāt /
GE07naray__u:2640: <12329.3/7> akṣayād ajarāmarād amūrtitaḥ sarvavyāpinaḥ sarvakartuḥ śāśvatāt tamasaḥ puruṣaḥ prādurbhūto harir avyayaḥ //12329.3/
GE07naray__u:2646: <12329.5/1> tasyedānīṃ tamaḥsaṃbhavasya puruṣasya padmayoner brahmaṇaḥ prādurbhāve sa puruṣaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣamāṇo netrābhyām agnīṣomau sasarja /
GE07naray__u:2647: <12329.5/2> tato bhūtasarge pravṛtte prajākramavaśād brahmakṣatram upātiṣṭhat /
GE07naray__u:2648: <12329.5/3> yaḥ somas tad brahma yad brahma te brāhmaṇāḥ /
GE07naray__u:2649: <12329.5/4> yo 'gnis tat kṣatraṃ kṣatrād brahma balavattaram /
GE07naray__u:2650: <12329.5/5> kasmād iti lokapratyakṣaguṇam etat tad yathā /
GE07naray__u:2653: <12329.5/8> bhūtasargaḥ kṛto brahmaṇā bhūtāni ca pratiṣṭhāpya trailokyaṃ dhāryatae iti //12329.5/
GE07naray__u:2662: <12329.7/1> na hy ete mantrād dhavanam asti /
GE07naray__u:2664: <12329.7/3> havir mantrāṇāṃ saṃpūjā vidyate devamanuṣyāṇām anena tvaṃ hoteti niyuktaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2665: <12329.7/4> ye ca mānuṣā hotrādhikārās te ca /
GE07naray__u:2666: <12329.7/5> brāhmaṇasya hi yājanaṃ vidhīyate na kṣatravaiśyayor dvijātyoḥ /
GE07naray__u:2667: <12329.7/6> tasmād brāhmaṇā hy agnibhūtā yajñān udvahanti /
GE07naray__u:2668: <12329.7/7> yajñā devāṃs tarpayanti devāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhāvayanti //12329.7/
GE07naray__u:2670: <12329.8/2> agnau samiddhe sa juhoti yo vidvān brāhmaṇamukhe dānāhutiṃ juhoti /
GE07naray__u:2671: <12329.8/3> evam apy agnibhūtā brāhmaṇā vidvāṃso 'gniṃ bhāvayanti /
GE07naray__u:2672: <12329.8/4> agnir viṣṇuḥ sarvabhūtāny anupraviśya prāṇān dhārayati /
GE07naray__u:2690: <12329.13/1> vedapurāṇetihāsaprāmāṇyān nārāyaṇamukhodgatāḥ sarvātmānaḥ sarvakartāraḥ sarvabhāvanāś ca brāhmaṇāḥ /
GE07naray__u:2691: <12329.13/2> vāksamakālaṃ hi tasya devasya varapradasya brāhmaṇāḥ prathamaṃ prādurbhūtā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca śeṣā varṇāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
GE07naray__u:2692: <12329.13/3> itthaṃ ca surāsuraviśiṣṭā brāhmaṇā yadā mayā brahmabhūtena purā svayam evotpāditāḥ surāsuramaharṣayo bhūtaviśeṣāḥ sthāpitā nigṛhītāś ca //12329.13/
GE07naray__u:2693: <12329.14/1> ahalyādharṣaṇanimittaṃ hi gautamād dhariśmaśrutām indraḥ prāptaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2695: <12329.14/3> aśvinor grahapratiṣedhodyatavajrasya puraṃdarasya cyavanena stambhito bāhuḥ /
GE07naray__u:2696: <12329.14/4> kratuvadhaprāptamanyunā ca dakṣeṇa bhūyas tapasā cātmānaṃ saṃyojya netrākṛtir anyā lalāṭe rudrasyotpāditā //12329.14/
GE07naray__u:2697: <12329.15/1> tripuravadhārthaṃ dīkṣām abhyupagatasya rudrasyośanasā śiraso jaṭā utkṛtya prayuktāḥ /
GE07naray__u:2699: <12329.15/3> tair asya bhujagaiḥ_1 pīḍyamānaḥ kaṇṭho nīlatām upanītaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2700: <12329.15/4> pūrve ca manvantare svāyaṃbhuve nārāyaṇahastabandhagrahaṇān nīlakaṇṭhatvam eva vā //12329.15/
GE07naray__u:2701: <12329.16/1> amṛtotpādane puraścaraṇatām upagatasyāṅgiraso bṛhaspater upaspṛśato na prasādaṃ gatavatyaḥ kilāpaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2703: <12329.16/3> yasmān mamopaspṛśataḥ kaluṣībhūtā na prasādam upagatās tasmād adyaprabhṛti jhaṣamakaramatsyakacchapajantusaṃkīrṇāḥ kaluṣībhavateti /
GE07naray__u:2705: <12329.17/1> viśvarūpo vai tvāṣṭraḥ purohito devānām āsīt svasrīyo 'surāṇām /
GE07naray__u:2706: <12329.17/2> sa pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asurebhyaḥ //12329.17/
GE07naray__u:2707: <12329.18/1> atha hiraṇyakaśipuṃ puraskṛtya_1 viśvarūpamātaraṃ svasāram asurā varam ayācanta /
GE07naray__u:2708: <12329.18/2> he svasar ayaṃ te putras tvāṣṭro viśvarūpas triśirā devānāṃ purohitaḥ pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asmākam /
GE07naray__u:2710: <12329.18/4> tad enaṃ tvaṃ vārayitum arhasi tathā yathāsmān bhajed iti //12329.18/
GE07naray__u:2712: <12329.19/2> putra kiṃ parapakṣavardhanas tvaṃ mātulapakṣaṃ nāśayasi /
GE07naray__u:2714: <12329.19/4> sa viśvarūpo mātur vākyam anatikramaṇīyam iti matvā saṃpūjya hiraṇyakaśipum agāt //12329.19/
GE07naray__u:2715: <12329.20/1> hairaṇyagarbhāc ca vasiṣṭhād dhiraṇyakaśipuḥ śāpaṃ prāptavān /
GE07naray__u:2716: <12329.20/2> yasmāt tvayānyo vṛto hotā tasmād asamāptayajñas tvam apūrvāt sattvajātād vadhaṃ prāpsyasīti /
GE07naray__u:2719: <12329.21/2> tasya vratabhaṅgārtham indro bahvīḥ śrīmatyo 'psaraso niyuyoja /
GE07naray__u:2720: <12329.21/3> tāś ca dṛṣṭvā manaḥ kṣubhitam tasyābhavat tāsu cāpsaraḥsu nacirād eva sakto 'bhavat /
GE07naray__u:2721: <12329.21/4> saktaṃ cainaṃ jñātvāpsarasa ūcur gacchāmahe vayaṃ yathāgatam iti //12329.21/
GE07naray__u:2723: <12329.22/2> kva gamiṣyatha āsyatām tāvan mayā saha śreyo bhaviṣyatīti /
GE07naray__u:2725: <12329.22/4> vayaṃ devastriyo 'psarasa indraṃ varadaṃ purā prabhaviṣṇuṃ vṛṇīmahae iti //12329.22/
GE07naray__u:2726: <12329.23/1> atha tā viśvarūpo 'bravīd adyaiva sendrā devā na bhaviṣyantīti /
GE07naray__u:2729: <12329.23/4> ekenāsyena sarvalokeṣu dvijaiḥ kriyāvadbhir yajñeṣu suhutaṃ somaṃ papāv ekenāpa ekena sendrān devān /
GE07naray__u:2730: <12329.23/5> athendras taṃ vivardhamānaṃ somapānāpyāyitasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā cintām āpede //12329.23/
GE07naray__u:2731: <12329.24/1> devāś ca te sahendreṇa brahmāṇam abhijagmur ūcuś ca /
GE07naray__u:2735: <12329.24/5> tad arhasi no vidhātuṃ śreyo yad anantaram iti //12329.24/
GE07naray__u:2736: <12329.25/1> tān brahmovāca ṛṣir bhārgavas tapas tapyate dadhīcaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2737: <12329.25/2> sa yācyatāṃ varaṃ yathā kalevaraṃ jahyāt /
GE07naray__u:2739: <12329.26/1> devās tatrāgacchan yatra dadhīco bhagavān ṛṣis tapas tepe /
GE07naray__u:2740: <12329.26/2> sendrā devās tam abhigamyocur bhagavaṃs tapasaḥ kuśalam avighnaṃ ceti /
GE07naray__u:2741: <12329.26/3> tān dadhīca uvāca svāgataṃ bhavadbhyaḥ kiṃ kriyatām /
GE07naray__u:2743: <12329.26/5> te tam abruvañ śarīraparityāgaṃ lokahitārthaṃ bhagavān kartum arhatīti /
GE07naray__u:2744: <12329.26/501> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: evam ukto dadhīcas tān abravīt /
GE07naray__u:2745: <12329.26/502> X sahasraṃ varṣāṇām aindraṃ padam avāpyate mayā yadi jahyām /
GE07naray__u:2746: <12329.26/503> X tathety uktvendraḥ svasthānaṃ dattvā tapasvy- abhavat /
GE07naray__u:2748: <12329.26/505> X tāvat pūrṇe sendrā devā āgaman kālo 'yaṃ dehanyāsāyeti /12329.26871/ X]
GE07naray__u:2749: <12329.26/6> atha dadhīcas tathaivāvimanāḥ sukhaduḥkhasamo mahāyogī ātmānaṃ samādhāya śarīraparityāgaṃ cakāra //12329.26/
GE07naray__u:2750: <12329.27/001> [X Kumbh..ed. ins.:: śrutir apy atra bhavati /
GE07naray__u:2751: <12329.27/002> X indro dadhīco 'sthibhiḥ kṛtam iti /12329.26872/ X]
GE07naray__u:2752: <12329.27/1> tasya paramātmany avasṛte tāny asthīni dhātā saṃgṛhya vajram akarot /
GE07naray__u:2753: <12329.27/2> tena vajreṇābhedyenāpradhṛṣyeṇa brahmāsthisaṃbhūtena viṣṇupraviṣṭenendro viśvarūpaṃ jaghāna /
GE07naray__u:2755: <12329.27/301> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. Cv:: takṣṇā yajñapaśoḥ śiras te dadāmīty uktvā /12329.27873/ X]
GE07naray__u:2756: <12329.27/4> tasmād anantaraṃ viśvarūpagātramathanasaṃbhavaṃ tvaṣṭrotpāditam evāriṃ vṛtram indro jaghāna //12329.27/
GE07naray__u:2757: <12329.28/1> tasyāṃ dvaidhībhūtāyāṃ brahmavadhyāyāṃ bhayād indro devarājyaṃ parityajya apsusaṃbhavāṃ śītalāṃ mānasasarogatāṃ nalinīṃ apsu /
GE07naray__u:2758: <12329.28/2> tatra caiśvaryayogād aṇumātro bhūtvā bisagranthiṃ praviveśa //12329.28/
GE07naray__u:2759: <12329.29/1> atha brahmavadhyābhayapranaṣṭe trailokyanāthe śacīpatau jagad anīśvaraṃ babhūva /
GE07naray__u:2765: <12329.30/1> atha devā ṛṣayaś cāyuṣaḥ putraṃ nahuṣaṃ nāma devarājatve 'bhiṣiṣicuḥ /
GE07naray__u:2766: <12329.30/2> nahuṣaḥ pañcabhiḥ śatair jyotiṣāṃ lalāṭe jvaladbhiḥ sarvatejoharais triviṣṭapaṃ pālayāṃ babhūva /
GE07naray__u:2767: <12329.30/3> atha lokāḥ prakṛtim āpedire svasthāś ca babhūvuḥ //12329.30/
GE07naray__u:2769: <12329.31/2> sarvaṃ māṃ śakropabhuktam upasthitam ṛte śacīm iti /
GE07naray__u:2770: <12329.31/3> sa evam uktvā śacīsamīpam agamad uvāca cainām /
GE07naray__u:2771: <12329.31/4> subhage 'ham indro devānāṃ bhajasva mām iti /
GE07naray__u:2777: <12329.32/3> aham indrasya rājyaratnaharo nātrādharmaḥ kaścit tvam indrabhukteti /
GE07naray__u:2780: <12329.32/6> tasyāvabhṛthe tvām upagamiṣyāmi kaiścid evāhobhir iti /
GE07naray__u:2782: <12329.33/1> atha śacī duḥkhaśokārtā bhartṛdarśanalālasā nahuṣabhayagṛhītā bṛhaspatim upāgacchat /
GE07naray__u:2783: <12329.33/2> sa ca tām abhigatāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva dhyānaṃ praviśya bhartṛkāryatatparāṃ jñātvā bṛhaspatir uvāca /
GE07naray__u:2784: <12329.33/3> anenaiva vratena tapasā cānvitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutim āhvaya /
GE07naray__u:2786: <12329.34/1> sātha mahāniyamam āsthitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutiṃ mantrair āhvayat /
GE07naray__u:2788: <12329.34/3> uvāca cainām iyam asmi tvayopahūtopasthitā kiṃ te priyaṃ karavāṇīti /
GE07naray__u:2789: <12329.34/4> tāṃ mūrdhnā praṇamyovāca śacī bhagavaty arhasi me bhartāraṃ darśayituṃ tvaṃ satyā matā ceti /
GE07naray__u:2792: <12329.35/1> tām indraḥ patnīṃ kṛśāṃ glānāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cintayāṃ babhūva /
GE07naray__u:2793: <12329.35/2> aho mama mahad duḥkham idam adyopagatam /
GE07naray__u:2794: <12329.35/3> naṣṭaṃ hi mām iyam anviṣyopāgamad duḥkhārteti /
GE07naray__u:2801: <12329.36/3> nahuṣas tvayā vācyo 'pūrveṇa mām ṛṣiyuktena yānena tvam adhirūḍha udvahasva /
GE07naray__u:2802: <12329.36/4> indrasya hi mahānti vāhanāni manasaḥ priyāṇy adhirūḍhāni mayā /
GE07naray__u:2806: <12329.37/1> athendrāṇim abhyāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvovāca nahuṣaḥ pūrṇaḥ sa kāla iti /
GE07naray__u:2808: <12329.37/3> sa maharṣiyuktaṃ vāhanam adhirūḍhaḥ śacīsamīpam upāgacchat //12329.37/
GE07naray__u:2809: <12329.38/1> atha maitrāvaruṇiḥ kumbhayonir agastyo maharṣīn vikriyamāṇāṃs tān nahuṣeṇāpaśyat /
GE07naray__u:2811: <12329.38/3> tataḥ sa nahuṣam abravīd akāryapravṛtta pāpa patasva mahīm /
GE07naray__u:2812: <12329.38/4> sarpo bhava yāvad bhūmir girayaś ca tiṣṭheyus tāvad iti /
GE07naray__u:2813: <12329.38/5> sa maharṣivākyasamakālam eva tasmād yānād avāpatat //12329.38/
GE07naray__u:2815: <12329.39/2> tato devā ṛṣayaś ca bhagavantaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaraṇam indrārthe 'bhijagmuḥ /
GE07naray__u:2816: <12329.39/3> ūcuś cainaṃ bhagavann indraṃ brahmavadhyābhibhūtaṃ trātum arhasīti /
GE07naray__u:2817: <12329.39/4> tataḥ sa varadas tān abravīd aśvamedhaṃ yajñaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śakro 'bhiyajatu /
GE07naray__u:2819: <12329.40/1> tato devā ṛṣayaś cendraṃ nāpaśyan yadā tadā śacīm ūcur gaccha subhage indram ānayasveti /
GE07naray__u:2821: <12329.40/3> indraś ca tasmāt sarasaḥ samutthāya bṛhaspatim abhijagāma /
GE07naray__u:2823: <12329.40/5> tataḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaṃ medhyam aśvam utsṛjya vāhanaṃ tam eva kṛtvā indraṃ marutpatiṃ bṛhaspatiḥ svasthānaṃ prāpayām āsa //12329.40/
GE07naray__u:2824: <12329.41/1> tataḥ sa devarāḍ devair ṛṣibhiḥ stūyamānas triviṣṭapastho niṣkalmaṣo babhūva /
GE07naray__u:2826: <12329.41/201> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Cs.v ins.:: vanitāsu rajaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2831: <12329.41/206> X tasmād dhavir alavaṇaṃ pacyate /12329.41874/ X]
GE07naray__u:2832: <12329.41/3> evaṃ indro brahmatejaḥprabhāvopabṛṃhitaḥ śatruvadhaṃ kṛtvā svasthānaṃ prāpitaḥ //12329.41/
GE07naray__u:2833: <12329.42/001> [X D7 T1 G1.3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: nahuṣasya śāpamokṣanimittaṃ devair ṛṣibhir yācyamāno 'gastyaḥ prāha /
GE07naray__u:2838: <12329.42/1> ākāśagaṅgāgataś ca purā bharadvājo maharṣir upāspṛśaṃs trīn kramān kramatā viṣṇunābhyāsāditaḥ /
GE07naray__u:2839: <12329.42/2> sa bharadvājena sasalilena pāṇinorasi tāḍitaḥ salakṣaṇoraskaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ //12329.42/
GE07naray__u:2841: <12329.44/1> aditir vai devānām annam apacad etad bhuktvāsurān haniṣyantīti /
GE07naray__u:2844: <12329.44/4> tatra devaiḥ pūrvam etat prāśyaṃ nānyenety aditir bhikṣāṃ nādāt /
GE07naray__u:2845: <12329.44/5> atha bhikṣāpratyākhyānaruṣitena budhena brahmabhūtena vivasvato dvitīye janmany aṇḍasaṃjñitasyāṇḍaṃ māritam adityāḥ /
GE07naray__u:2846: <12329.44/501> [X K6.7 V1 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2-5.7-9 Cs Kumbh..ed. ins. after brahmabhūtena: :
GE07naray__u:2848: aditiḥ śaptā aditer udare bhaviṣyati vyathā /12329.44876/ X]
GE07naray__u:2851: <12329.45/2> tābhyaḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa prādād daśa dharmāya daśa manave saptaviṃśatim indave /
GE07naray__u:2852: <12329.45/3> tāsu tulyāsu nakṣatrākhyāṃ gatāsu somo rohiṇyām abhyadhikāṃ prītim akarot /
GE07naray__u:2853: <12329.45/4> tatas tāḥ śeṣāḥ patnya īrṣyāvatyaḥ pituḥ samīpaṃ somo rohiṇīm adhikaṃ bhajatīti /
GE07naray__u:2857: <12329.46/3> dakṣaś cainam abravīn na samaṃ vartasae iti /
GE07naray__u:2864: <12329.46/91> tatra cāvabhāsitas tīrthe yadā somas tadāprabhṛti tīrthaṃ tat prabhāsam iti nāmnā khyātaṃ babhūva (/)
GE07naray__u:2867: <12329.46/94> meghasadṛśaṃ varṇam agamat tad asya śaśalakṣma vimalam abhavat //12329.46/
GE07naray__u:2868: <12329.47/1> sthūlaśirā maharṣir meroḥ prāguttare digbhāge tapas tepe /
GE07naray__u:2869: <12329.47/2> tasya tapas tapyamānasya sarvagandhavahaḥ śucir vāyur vivāyamānaḥ śarīram aspṛśat /
GE07naray__u:2870: <12329.47/3> sa tapasā tāpitaśarīraḥ kṛśo vāyunopavījyamāno hṛdayaparitoṣam agamat /
GE07naray__u:2871: <12329.47/4> tatra tasyānilavyajanakṛtaparitoṣasya sadyo vanaspatayaḥ puṣpaśobhāṃ na darśitavanta iti sa etāñ śaśāpa na sarvakālaṃ puṣpavanto bhaviṣyatheti //12329.47/
GE07naray__u:2872: <12329.48/1> nārāyaṇo lokahitārthaṃ vaḍavāmukho nāma maharṣiḥ purābhavat /
GE07naray__u:2873: <12329.48/2> tasya merau tapas tapyataḥ samudra āhūto nāgataḥ /
GE07naray__u:2877: <12329.48/6> etac ca te toyaṃ vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitena pīyamānaṃ madhuraṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE07naray__u:2878: <12329.48/7> tad etad adyāpi vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitenānuvartinā toyaṃ sāmudraṃ pīyate //12329.48/
GE07naray__u:2879: <12329.49/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: punar umā dakṣakopād dhimavato girer duhitā babhūva /12329.48877/ X]
GE07naray__u:2880: <12329.49/1> himavato girer duhitaram umāṃ rudraś cakame /
GE07naray__u:2881: <12329.49/2> bhṛgur api ca maharṣir himavantam āgamyābravīt kanyām umāṃ me dehīti /
GE07naray__u:2882: <12329.49/3> tam abravīd dhimavān abhilaṣito varo rudra iti /
GE07naray__u:2883: <12329.49/4> tam abravīd bhṛgur yasmāt tvayāhaṃ kanyāvaraṇakṛtabhāvaḥ pratyākhyātas tasmān na ratnānāṃ bhavān bhājanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GE07naray__u:2886: <12329.50/2> kṣatram api śāśvatīm avyayāṃ pṛthivīṃ patnīm abhigamya bubhuje /
GE07naray__u:2964: <12330.19/001> [X D7 T G2.3.6 ins.:: adho na kṣīyate yasmād /
GE07naray__u:2990: <12330.25/001> [X K7 D4.9 ins.:: nādimantaṃ na cāntaṃ ca /
GE07naray__u:2992: <12330.25/1> na cādiṃ na madhyaṃ tathā naiva cāntaṃ /
GE07naray__u:2994: <12330.25/3> anādyo hy amadhyas tathā cāpy anantaḥ /
GE07naray__u:3106: <12330.50/003> X uccheṣaṇabhāgo vai rudras tasyoccheṣaṇena hotavyam iti sarve gamyarūpeṇa tadā /12330.49881/ X]
GE07naray__u:3173: <12330.64/1> yas tvāṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti /
GE07naray__u:3174: yas tvām anu sa mām anu /
GE07naray__u:3273: <12331.13/201> [X T2 G1.2 ins.:: dṛṣṭavān yo hariṃ devaṃ /
GE07naray__u:3297: <12331.19/001> [X K1.2.4 V1 ins. after 18:: sūta uvāca:
GE07naray__u:3306: <12331.19/005> [X D7 T G1-3.6 ins. after 18:: sūta uvāca:
GE07naray__u:3322: <12331.20/001> [X T1 G3.6 T2 G1.2 ins.:: nāsti nārāyaṇasamaṃ /
GE07naray__u:3546: <12332.14/001> [X V1 B6.8 D7 T G1-3.6 M1.5-7 Kumbh..ed. ins.:: jvālāmālī mahātejā /
GE07naray__u:3582: <12332.22/001> [X D7 T G2.3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins. after 21,
GE07naray__u:3792: <12334.14/3> ekāntināṃ śaraṇado 'bhayado gatido 'stu vaḥ sa makhabhāgaharas triguṇātigaḥ //12334.14/
GE07naray__u:3840: <12335.8/001> [X K7 D4.9 ins.:: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi /
GE07naray__u:4481: <12336.62/001> [X T1 G3.6 ins.:: tad eva kevalaṃ sthānaṃ /
GE07naray__u:4689: <12337.27/002> [X D7 T1 G3.6 cont.:: tathākaroc ca dharmātmā /
GE07naray__u:4789: <12337.48/6> tasmād ṛṣes tvaṃ bhavitā ca putraḥ //12337.48/
GE07naray__u:4882: <12337.68/1> sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca sanātane dve /
GE07naray__u:5077: <12339.18/1> yad vai sūte dhātur ādyaṃ nidhānaṃ /
GE07naray__u:5079: <12339.18/3> yad vai loke vaidikaṃ karma sādhu /
GE07naray__u:5084: <12339.19/4> tasmāj jātas tvaṃ ca mattaḥ prasūtaḥ /
GE07naray__u:5115: <12999.31/01> X na mitraṃ na kalatraṃ vā /
GE07naray__u:5166: <12999.32/012> X sūta uvāca: tasmin yajñe vartamāne /
GE07naray__u:5179: <12999.32/018> X badary-āśramam āgamya samāgamya ca tāv ṛṣī /
GE07naray__u:5181: kāṃ kathām pṛṣṭavāṃś ca saḥ /12999.32/ X]
